General.Name: Nongwoobio Co. Ltd
General.Description: Nongwoobio Co., Ltd. develops and distributes seeds for various vegetables primarily in South Korea. The company offers seeds for tomato, pepper, kohlrabi, broccoli, cauliflower, Chinese cabbage, radish, cucumber, watermelon, melon, squash, gourd, carrot, onion, bunching onion, lettuce, pak choi, spinach, and sweet corn. It also distributes bed soil, fertilizer, and soil conditioner. The company was formerly known as Nongwoo Seed and changed its name to Nongwoobio Co., Ltd. in 2000. The company was founded in 1967 and is based in Suwon, South Korea. Nongwoobio Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of NongHyup Agribusiness Group Inc.
